Test Name: Parvovirus B19 DNA Detection by PCR
Specimen Type: Whole blood, serum, plasma, bone marrow, amniotic fluid, or fetal tissue
Purpose: To accurately detect Parvovirus B19 DNA in clinical specimens using PCR.
Container: Appropriate sterile container for the submitted specimen (e.g., EDTA tube for blood)
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, Class II biosafety cabinet, micropipettes with sterile tips, nucleic acid extraction kit
